Bundle name

trans-unit.source: Meal data from the Health database is used to determine glucose effects. Glucose data from the Health database is used for graphing and momentum calculation.
trans-unit.target: Die Essensdaten aus der Health-Datenbank werden verwendet, um Blutzuckereffekte zu bestimmen. Glukosedaten aus der Integritätsdatenbank werden für die Graphik- und Impulsberechnung verwendet.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Health Share Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Carbohydrate meal data entered in the app is stored in the Health database. Glucose data is stored securely in HealthKit.
trans-unit.target: Die in der App eingegebenen Kohlenhydrat-Essensdaten werden in der Health-Datenbank gespeichert. Blutzuckerdaten werden sicher in HealthKit gespeichert.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Health Update Usage Description

trans-unit.id: The pump ID can be found printed on the back, or near the bottom of the STATUS/Esc screen. It is the strictly numerical portion of the serial number (shown as SN or S/N).
trans-unit.source: The pump ID can be found printed on the back, or near the bottom of the STATUS/Esc screen. It is the strictly numerical portion of the serial number (shown as SN or S/N).
trans-unit.target: Die Pumpen-ID finden Sie auf der Rückseite oder am unteren Rand des STATUS / Esc-Bildschirms. Dies ist der streng numerische Teil der Seriennummer (gezeigt als SN oder S/N).
trans-unit.note: Instructions on where to find the pump ID on a Minimed pump
Bundle name

trans-unit.source: Meal data from the Health database is used to determine glucose effects. Glucose data is retrieved from HealthKit for graphing and analysis.
trans-unit.target: Die Essensdaten aus der Health-Datenbank werden verwendet, um Blutzuckereffekte zu bestimmen. Blutzuckerdaten werden aus HealthKit für Graphiken und Analysen abgerufen.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Health Share Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Carbohydrate meal data entered in the app is stored in the Health database. Glucose data is stored securely in HealthKit.
trans-unit.target: Die in der App eingegebenen Kohlenhydrat-Essensdaten werden in der Health-Datenbank gespeichert. Blutzuckerdaten werden sicher in HealthKit gespeichert.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Health Update Usage Description

trans-unit.id: %1$@ will deliver basal and recommend bolus insulin only if your glucose is predicted to be above this limit for the next three hours.
trans-unit.source: %1$@ will deliver basal and recommend bolus insulin only if your glucose is predicted to be above this limit for the next three hours.
trans-unit.target: %1$@ wird Basal und empfohlenes Bolus-Insulin nur liefern, wenn Ihr vorhergesagter Blutzucker für die nächsten drei Stunden über diesem Grenzwert zu sein scheint.
trans-unit.note: Descriptive format string for glucose safety limit (1: app name)

trans-unit.id: Your Basal Rate of insulin is the number of units per hour that you want to use to cover your background insulin needs.
trans-unit.source: Your Basal Rate of insulin is the number of units per hour that you want to use to cover your background insulin needs.
trans-unit.target: Ihre Basalrate ist die Anzahl der Einheiten pro Stunde, die Sie verwenden möchten, um Ihren ständigen Insulinbedarf zu decken.
trans-unit.note: Descriptive text for basal rate

trans-unit.id: Your Carb Ratio is the number of grams of carbohydrates covered by one unit of insulin.
trans-unit.source: Your Carb Ratio is the number of grams of carbohydrates covered by one unit of insulin.
trans-unit.target: Ihr KH-Verhältnis ist die Anzahl der Gramm Kohlenhydrate, die von einer Einheit Insulin abgedeckt werden.
trans-unit.note: Descriptive text for carb ratio

trans-unit.id: Your Insulin Sensitivities refer to the drop in glucose expected from one unit of insulin.

trans-unit.target: Ihre Insulinempfindlichkeiten beziehen sich auf den Rückgang des Blutzuckers, der von einer Einheit Insulin erwartet wird.
trans-unit.note: Descriptive text for insulin sensitivity

trans-unit.id: If these settings look good to you, tap Save Settings to continue.

trans-unit.id: If you've used a CGM before, you're likely familiar with target range as a wide range of values you'd like for your glucose notification alerts, such as 70-180 mg/dL or 90-200 mg/dL.
trans-unit.source: If you've used a CGM before, you're likely familiar with target range as a wide range of values you'd like for your glucose notification alerts, such as 70-180 mg/dL or 90-200 mg/dL.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie bereits ein CGM verwendet haben, sind Sie wahrscheinlich mit dem Zielbereich und einer Vielzahl von Werten vertraut, die Sie für Ihre Blutzuckerbenachrichtigungswarnungen wünschen, z. B. 70-180 mg/dL oder 4-10 mmol/L.
trans-unit.note: Information about target range
Title text for multi-value insulin sensitivity warning

trans-unit.id: Insulin sensitivity describes how your blood glucose should respond to a 1 Unit dose of insulin. Smaller values mean more insulin will be given when above target. Values that are too small can cause dangerously low blood glucose.
trans-unit.source: Insulin sensitivity describes how your blood glucose should respond to a 1 Unit dose of insulin. Smaller values mean more insulin will be given when above target. Values that are too small can cause dangerously low blood glucose.
trans-unit.target: Die Insulinempfindlichkeit beschreibt, wie Ihr Blutzucker auf die Insulindosis von 1 Einheit reagiert. Kleinere Werte bedeuten, dass mehr Insulin verabreicht wird, wenn der BZ über dem Ziel liegt. Zu kleine Werte können gefährlich niedrige Blutzuckerwerte verursachen.
trans-unit.note: The description shown on the insulin sensitivity schedule interface.
Description of an interrupted bolus dose entry (1: title for dose type, 2: value (? if no value) in bold, 3: programmed value (? if no value), 4: unit)

trans-unit.id: It can be set as low as %1$@. It can be set as high as %2$@.
trans-unit.source: It can be set as low as %1$@. It can be set as high as %2$@.
trans-unit.target: Es kann so niedrig wie %1$@ eingestellt werden. Es kann so hoch wie %2$@ eingestellt werden.

trans-unit.id: Temporarily lower your glucose target before a meal to impact post-meal glucose spikes.

trans-unit.id: Temporarily raise your glucose target before, during, or after physical activity to reduce the risk of low glucose events.
trans-unit.source: Temporarily raise your glucose target before, during, or after physical activity to reduce the risk of low glucose events.
trans-unit.target: Erhöhen Sie Ihr Blutzuckerziel vorübergehend, während oder nach körperlicher Aktivität, um das Risiko von tiefen Blutzuckerwerten zu reduzieren.

trans-unit.id: The rapid-acting adult model assumes peak activity at 75 minutes.

trans-unit.id: Work with your healthcare provider to choose a value that is higher than your highest scheduled basal rate, but as conservative or aggressive as you feel comfortable.

trans-unit.id: Workout Range is the glucose value or range of values you want %1$@ to target during activity. This range will be in effect when you activate the Workout Preset button.
trans-unit.source: Workout Range is the glucose value or range of values you want %1$@ to target during activity. This range will be in effect when you activate the Workout Preset button.

trans-unit.id: You can add different carb ratios for different times of day by using the ➕.

trans-unit.source: You can choose how %@ measures rapid acting insulin's peak activity according to one of these two insulin models.

trans-unit.id: You can edit a setting by tapping into any line item.
trans-unit.source: You can edit a setting by tapping into any line item.

trans-unit.id: You can edit the setting by tapping into the line item.

trans-unit.target: Sie können die Einstellung bearbeiten, indem Sie auf die Position tippen.

trans-unit.id: Your Basal Rate of insulin is the number of units per hour that you want to use to cover your background insulin needs.
trans-unit.source: Your Basal Rate of insulin is the number of units per hour that you want to use to cover your background insulin needs.
trans-unit.target: Ihre Basalrate von Insulin ist die Anzahl der Einheiten pro Stunde, die Sie verwenden möchten, um Ihren Basis-Insulinbedarf zu decken.
trans-unit.note: Information about basal rates

trans-unit.id: Your Insulin Sensitivity Factor (ISF) is the drop in glucose expected from one unit of insulin.
trans-unit.source: Your Insulin Sensitivity Factor (ISF) is the drop in glucose expected from one unit of insulin.
trans-unit.target: Ihr Insulinsensitivitätsfaktor (ISF) ist der Rückgang der Glukose, der von einer Insulineinheit erwartet wird.
trans-unit.note: Description of insulin sensitivity factor

trans-unit.id: Your Pre-Meal Range should be the glucose value (or range of values) you want %1$@ to target by the time you take your first bite of your meal. This range will be in effect when you activate the Pre-Meal Preset button.
trans-unit.source: Your Pre-Meal Range should be the glucose value (or range of values) you want %1$@ to target by the time you take your first bite of your meal. This range will be in effect when you activate the Pre-Meal Preset button.
trans-unit.target: Ihr Pre-Meal-Bereich sollte der Blutzuckerwert (oder den Wertebereich) sein, den Sie %1$@ bis zu dem Zeitpunkt, an dem Sie Ihren ersten Biss essen, anvisieren möchten. Dieser Bereich wird wirksam, wenn Sie die Pre-Meal VoreinstellungsTaste aktivieren.
trans-unit.note: Information about pre-meal range format (1: app name)

trans-unit.id: Your healthcare provider can help you choose a Correction Range that's right for you.

trans-unit.target: Ihr Gesundheitsdienstleister kann Ihnen bei der Auswahl eines Korrekturbereichs helfen, der genau das Richtige für Sie ist.

trans-unit.id:
%@ has been unable to communicate with the Simulator Pump since %@.
Without communication, the app cannot continue to send commands for insulin delivery or display accurate, recent information about your active insulin or the insulin being delivered.
trans-unit.source:
%1$@ has been unable to communicate with the Simulator Pump since %2$@.
Without communication, the app cannot continue to send commands for insulin delivery or display accurate, recent information about your active insulin or the insulin being delivered.
trans-unit.target:
%1$@ konnte seit %2$@ nicht mehr mit der Simulatorpumpe kommunizieren.
Ohne Kommunikation kann die App keine Befehle für die Insulinabgabe senden oder genaue, aktuelle Informationen über Ihr aktives Insulin oder das zugelieferte Insulin anzeigen.
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
